description:
Being a candle designer its all about how many formulas and different techniques you know. Again like being a chef in a kitchen the more recipes you know the greater your creative potential

In the second of the series you will get the chance to work with different temperatures and the wonderful effects they can achieve. This course moves into advanced techniques and finishes. There are extensive formulas working with Ice and creating illuminating lanterns

The possibilities of the different effects wax can create is explored in depth
title: Learn Candlemaking to Start a Business Course 2
